data.lyric:
[ti:The Joker And The Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran,Taylor Swift]
[al:The Joker And The Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[by:p_qxiuliu]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Joker And The Queen (feat. Taylor Swift) - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)/Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.50]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson/Johnny McDaid/Sam Roman/Taylor Swift
[00:00.71]How was I to know
[00:03.90]It's a crazy thing
[00:07.95]I showed you my hand
[00:11.02]And you still let me win
[00:14.81]And who was I to say
[00:18.28]That this was meant to be
[00:22.16]The road that was broken
[00:25.95]Brought us together
[00:29.71]And I know
[00:32.84]You could fall for a thousand kings
[00:37.30]And hearts
[00:39.97]That would give you a diamond ring
[00:43.73]When I fold
[00:47.19]You see the best in me
[00:51.59]The joker and the queen
[00:57.74]I've been played before
[01:01.52]If you hadn't guessed
[01:05.12]So I kept my cards closed
[01:08.40]To my foolproof vest
[01:12.11]But you called my bluff
[01:15.57]And saw through all my tells
[01:19.27]And then you went all in
[01:23.17]And we left together
[01:26.58]And I know
[01:30.30]You think that what makes a king
[01:34.52]Is gold
[01:37.53]A palace and diamond rings
[01:41.04]When I fold
[01:44.72]You see the best in me
[01:48.68]The joker and the queen
[02:24.37]And I know
[02:27.49]You could fall for a thousand kings
[02:32.07]And hearts
[02:34.62]That would give you a diamond ring
[02:38.72]When I folded
[02:42.27]You saw the best in me
[02:46.33]The joker and the queen
[02:53.31]The joker and the queen
data.trans:
[ti:The Joker And The Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran,Taylor Swift]
[al:The Joker And The Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[by:p_qxiuliu]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.50]//
[00:00.71]那时的我又怎能预料
[00:03.90]这是多么疯狂
[00:07.95]我向你摊牌
[00:11.02]你依然选择让我赢得胜利
[00:14.81]那时的我哪有什么自信
[00:18.28]说这一切都是命中注定
[00:22.16]这条支离破碎的道路
[00:25.95]让我们相遇
[00:29.71]我知道
[00:32.84]你有无数次机会拿起那些国王牌
[00:37.30]让那些男人为你献出真心
[00:39.97]呈上钻戒
[00:43.73]我选择弃牌
[00:47.19]你却发现了我面具背后的赤诚之心
[00:51.59]小丑与皇后搭配在了一起
[00:57.74]我曾遭受过别人的戏弄
[01:01.52]如果你不曾看透真实的我
[01:05.12]我会合上我手里的牌
[01:08.40]藏在密不透风的马甲里
[01:12.11]但你要求我亮出底牌
[01:15.57]你看透了我其中玄机
[01:19.27]然后你押上全部 孤注一掷
[01:23.17]最后我们一同离开了那里
[01:26.58]我知道
[01:30.30]你觉得国王所拥有的不过是
[01:34.52]金银
[01:37.53]宫殿 还有钻戒
[01:41.04]我选择弃牌
[01:44.72]你却发现了我面具背后的赤诚之心
[01:48.68]小丑与皇后搭配在了一起
[02:24.37]我知道
[02:27.49]你有无数次机会拿起那些国王牌
[02:32.07]让那些男人为你献出真心
[02:34.62]呈上钻戒
[02:38.72]我选择弃牌
[02:42.27]你却发现了我面具背后的赤诚之心
[02:46.33]小丑与皇后搭配在了一起
[02:53.31]小丑与皇后搭配在了一起
